  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El món per un forat. Paisatge: El fons marí</string>
            <string language="en">"The world through a keyhole". The seabed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"die Welt durch ein Schlüsselloch". Der 
Meeresgrund</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"le monde par un trou de la serrure". Le 
fond de la mer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"o mundo através de um buraco da fechadura". 
O seabed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il mondo attraverso un buco della serratura". 
Il fondo marino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ο κόσμος μέσω μιας κλειδαρότρυπασ". Ο βυθός</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Capítol de la sèrie "El món per un forat" sobre la fauna del fons marí. Presenta animals que hi viuen: el besuc, el pop, l'escórpora, les cloïses, l'eriçó de mar, l'estrella de mar i les anemones. Conté un vídeo, fotos amb imatges del vídeo, dibuixos per imprimir i pintar amb colors, sons i activitats lúdiques i d'aprenentatge.</string>
            <string language="en">A chapter in the series "The World through a Keyhole" on the fauna that live on the seabed: sea bream, octopuses, scorpion fish, clams, sea urchins, starfish and sea anemones. It includes a live video, stills from the video, drawings to print and colour, sounds, and learning activities and games.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mar</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
            <string language="es">mar</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kapitel in den Serien "die Welt durch ein 
Schlüsselloch" auf der Fauna, die auf dem Meeresgrund leben: 
Seebrachsen, Kraken, scorpion Fische, Muscheln, Seeigel, 
Starfish und Seeanemonen. Es schließt einen Phasenbildschirm, 
Stille vom Bildschirm, Zeichnungen ein, um zu drucken und Farbe, Töne
und Lernenaktivitäten und -spiele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un chapitre des séries "le monde par un trou de 
la serrure" sur la faune qui vivent sur le fond de la mer : 
dorade, poulpes, poissons de scorpion, palourdes, oursins, 
étoiles de mer et actinies. Il inclut un vidéo de phase, des 
distillateurs du vidéo, des schémas pour imprimer et couleur, des 
bruits, et étude et des jeux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um capítulo nas séries "o mundo através de um 
buraco da fechadura" no fauna que vivem no seabed: brema de mar,
polvos, peixes do scorpion, moluscos, urchins de mar, starfish e 
anemones de mar. Inclui um vídeo vivo, destiladores do vídeo, 
desenhos para imprimir e cor, sons, e atividades e jogos de 
aprendizagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un capitolo in serie "il mondo attraverso un buco
della serratura" sulla fauna che vive sul fondo marino: 
abramide, polipi, pesci di scorpion, molluschi, urchins di mare,
starfish ed anemones di mare. Include un video in tensione, 
alambicchi dal video, illustrazioni per stampare e colore, attività 
imparare e dei suoni e giochi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κεφάλαιο στις σειρές "ο κόσμος μέσω μιας 
κλειδαρότρυπασ" στην πανίδα που ζουν στο βυθό: τσιπούρα, 
χταπόδια, ψάρια σκορπιών, μαλάκια, αχινοί, αστερίας και θάλασσα
anemones. Περιλαμβάνει ένα ζωντανό βίντεο, τους 
αποστακτήρες από το βίντεο, τα σχέδια στην τυπωμένη ύλη και το 
χρώμα, τους ήχους, και τις δραστηριότητες και τα παιχνίδια 
εκμάθησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences normales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências naturais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze naturali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θάλασσα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
